description:
Allows Notepad++ settings to be installed from a provided URL. 
		
To use, you will need to call Chocolatey like so:
		
	choco install notepadplusplus.settings -params 'url=https://yoursite.com/NotepadSettings/'

I recommend using the -Force flag for subsequent settings updates.

Because Notepad++ has several configuration files, the URL must specify a folder. The package installation will then attempt to download all of the following files:
* config.xml
* contextMenu.xml
* functionList.xml
* langs.xml
* shortcuts.xml
* stylers.xml
* <your theme>.xml 
	
To get your theme copied, you must drop your current theme file into the directory as well.
summary: Allows Notepad++ settings to be installed from a provided URL.
author: Jason Capriotti
